Short Description: MOBILSING COMMUNITIES IN THE COUNTIES FOR ACCOUNTABILITY AND REALIZATION OF HUMAN RIGHTS
Project title: Mobilsing Communities in the Counties for accountability and realization of human rights
Long Description: The project seeks to contribute to a fair and social society, based on principles of transparency, accountability, good governance and the fulfillment of human rights. The project works from three field offices in Maralal, Isiolo/ Garissa and Mombasa. Film documentation are used for awareness creation,  mobilization and capacity-building of communities in marginalised areas.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: 6TH CORPORATE PLAN - 'SHINING THE LIGHT OF CHRIST
Project title: 6th Corporate Plan - 'Shining the Light of Christ
Long Description: Strengthening the unity of the churches through dialogue and capacity building of its members, joint lobbying and advocacy work for accountable governance, resource protection and climate resilience. Wide cooperation with all ecumenical forces and civil society actors in the promotion of peace and justice.

Project title: Professional training and psychosocial support for women and girls in Colombia and Ecuador
Long Description: Improving the living conditions of prostitutes and vulnerable young women through professional training and personal development processes to develop professional alternatives and constructively participate in improving the social structures of this population

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: FORMATION PROCESSES AND PSYCHOSOCIAL SUPPORT FOR WOMEN AND YOUNG WOMEN IN COLOMBIA AND ECUADOR
Project title: Formation processes and psychosocial support for women and young women in Colombia and Ecuador
Purpose Name: Ending violence against women and girls
Long Description: In Colombia and Ecuador by means of human development and vocational training, 6.066 women in prostitution or at risk of it, will be enabled to develop selfdetermined income alternatives, to integrate themselves  into a dignified social environment, to gradually step out of prostitution and to contribute to improve the social structures for other persons affected by similar situations.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: STRENGTHENING CIVIL SOCIETY IN THE REGIONS OF THE REPUBLIC OF ARMENIA
Project title: Strengthening Civil Society in the Regions of the Republic of Armenia
Long Description: The project contributes to the protection of human rights and the strengthening of civil society in Armenia (with focus on Yerevan and the three marzes Syunik, Gegharkunik, Shirak). Means to reach this goal are educational work, strengthening of participatory approaches as well as demands on the governing entities to abide the rule of law.

Project title: Key Competence for Civic Engagement and Democratic Governance
Purpose Name: Decentralisation and support to subnational government
Long Description: Strengthening of positive achievements of activism in Azerbaijan and Georgia through capacity building programme for civil society actors. Improving of performance of georgian local self-governments by strengthening their internal management systems, information exchange and potential replication with kirgistan stakeholders from authorities.

Long Description: Protecting and promoting socio-economic rights of the most vulnerable in Georgia, through free legal aid and advocating for an improvement of the regulatory framework. At the same time Gyla advocates municipalities to adopt development-oriented local initiatives, programms and budgets to promote income-generation activities in local communities.

Project title: Projects in support of the Special Initiative One World without Hunger (SEWOH II) in Kenya
Long Description: Through the Route to Food Alliance, which uses direct stakeholder engegament, members of the urban middler class, research and academia, media, civil society, policy-makers and decision-makers are mobilized. The Alliance facilitates a politically orientated narrative that runs alongside technical debates, and promotes sound food security policies and their implementation in Kenya.

Long Description: In addition to lack of capacity, Mara's livestock farmers are suffering from poor networks and lack market connections. The projct seeks to increase the income by strengthening the self-help potentials of the population through coordinated training and counseling as well as targeted market integration to counteract their political social isolation.

Long Description: The main goal of the project is to contribute to improved access to financial services outside the economic centers of the project participating countries. The project goal in pilot land Zambia in the orientation phase is to effectively use the branch network of NATSAVE to improve access to financial services for the general public and of micro-enterprises. Project title: Laying a just foundation for food security in Sub-Saharan Africa

The role of smallholder agriculture in structural transformation shall be recognised. It also advocates for social security systems in order to secure livelihoods. Finally, it will support trade unions in finding answers to changes in food production and push for the decent work agenda.

Project title: Africa I, Development of Self-help-Organisations - Fighting poverty through social structures training by the association
Long Description: This project enables economically and socially disadvantaged people in Eastern and Southern Africa to improve their incomes. They are supported through boosting agricultural production and promotion of processing and marketing of products and through the support of microfinance. In South Africa vocational training opportunities are organized for unemployed young adults.

Long Description: The project intends to improve the positive impact of organized self-help on local livelihood by strengthening cooperative systems and structures in selected partner countriesin East Africa (Kenya, Uganda and other countries of the region) aiming a sustainable improvement of economic and social structures and alleviate poverty in the long run.

Project title: Enhancing the Resilience of Gaza Citizens against volatile Water availability
Long Description: The project aims to counter the ongoing water scarcity and unpredictability by constructing rain water harvesting ponds. A communal pond in Um el Nasser as well as smaller ponds for approximately 200 farmers will channel rain water to the ponds, from where it can be added to the aquifer or pumped to the agricultural sites.

It includes networking on climate justice at local, national, regional and international policy levels.

Project title: Towards an Ambitious Implementation of the Paris Agreement in the Light of Sustainable Development and Stakeholder Participation
Long Description: ACT Alliance, its members, and partners use their on-ground relations in the global south and their moral recognition as FBOs to give climate-vulnerable people a political voice, to raise the ethical imperative of ambitious local, national, and global climate action, and to mainstream climate action in various national development agendas.

Project title: Global Program Climate and Energy (CE4)
Long Description: Against the background of the positive experiences with the regional projects Energy security and Climate Change in Latin America and in Asia-Pacific as well as the project work in the field of climate and energy through the Multinational Development Policy Dialogue in Brussels and the country project Zimbabwe, the present application is conceived as a continuation of the above-mentioned existing projects. An indirect contribution to mitigation and adaptation shall be achieved by enhancing target groups to improve political and social conditions for sustainable development.

Project title: International climate and environment protection
Long Description: Representatives from politics, business and civil society, especially in the emerging countries, act based on market economy and regulatory policies for climate-friendly growth and adaptation to climate change. With the help of civic education and policy dialogue, they are aware of climate change and possible solutions. Topics include sustainable mobility and sustainable cities.

Long Description: The proposal has a general international climate and development focus in so far that the target of our efforts concern global governance. However, with regard to specific activities in specific regions, Nature Code will leverage of Carbon Market Watch's existing significant network with civil society organizations in developing countries in Asia, Africa and Latin America.

Long Description: The project 'Democratic and social shaping of globalization' supports partners in contributing to political debates about the shaping of globalization. It helps them to react to challenges posed by globalization at the national level. And it strengthens the understanding of political decision-makers in the global north about globalization.

Long Description: The Regional program aims at the support of democratic political culture, gender-equity,participation of civil society in political processes and ecological modernization of economies in Eastern and South Eastern Europe. In addition, the program fosters the cooperation of civil societies from the region with Germany and the European Union.

Long Description: The programme contributes to he implementation of global social right in the programme countries - Jordan, Palestinian Territories, and Turkey. It strengthens left-wing and progressive actor sand organisations in their work and aspirations to put into practice their demands and activities aimed to maintain and create societies based on solidarity, democracy, and social, ecological and gender equality.

Long Description: Preparatory measures and theirsupport by professionals have proved in the past to be an essential instrument for the development of possible perspectives and spheres of activity for a futureengagement Heinrich B÷ll Stiftung in a new region or for a new thematical focus. Conferences, discussion rounds and workshops as well as meetings with potential partner organizationsand representatives of important public authorities in the region are also part oft he programme. Specific questions that ocur when setting up a new representation, can directly be discussed on site.

Long Description: Socio-political cooperation program Middle East and Northern Africa

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: SOCIO-POLITICAL CONSULTANCY IN THE EUROPEAN UNION
Project title: Socio-political Consultancy in the European Union
Long Description: The EU-Office of the FES as an agency of dialogue, education and consultancy participates in the European integration process, supports the interests of 01.01.18 -31.12.20 Germany and contributes to shaping the EU's development cooperation and external relations. A special emphasis is put on the promotion of democratic participation and the strengthening of civil society. The offices' worldwide network facilitates political, economic, social and environmental dialogue between Germany and Europe, within Europe and also between Europe, the rest of the world and at global scale.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: DEMOCRACY AND PEACE
Project title: Democracy and Peace
Long Description: This programme aims at substantiating and further qualifying the programmatic work in the areas ' democracy building and political participation', 'gender politics and LGBTI' and 'digital change'. It contributes to enable colleagues, partners and activists to work effectively towards democracy, political participation, gender democracy, internet freedom, digital human rights. Furthermore, the programme will provide new impulses in the political and expert debates.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: REGIONAL PROGRAM MIDDLE EAST/NORTH AFRIKA
Project title: Regional Program Middle East/North Afrika
Long Description: The programme promotes the political, economic and social development of the Middle East and North Africa and facilitates dialogue and cooperation between Germany/Europe and the states as well as among the societies of the region. Emphasis is put on democracy and rule of law, free and pluralistic civil society, social and ecological market economy, including entrepreneurship, as well as on the joint responsibility to work against the roots and repercussions of terrorism and forced migration.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: SOCIO-POLITICAL COOPERATION PROGRAM MIDDLE EAST AND NORTHERN AFRICA
Project title: Socio-political cooperation program Middle East and Northern Africa
Long Description: With ist socio-political cooperation program in the Middle East and North Africa FES carries out political education and offers policy advice. FES implements activities in the fields of strengthening democratic actors and structures, dialogue within societies and on a regional level to promote peace and security as well as promoting ecologically and socially sustainable economies. Another field of work concerns gender equality and social justice, the latter with a particular focus on the cooperation with trade unions.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: REGIONAL PROJECT - PROMOTING DEMOCRACY, CIVIL SOCIETY AND MARKET ECONOMY IN NORTHERN AFRICA AND THE MIDDLE EAST
Project title: Regional Project - promoting democracy, Civil Society and Market Economy in Northern Africa and the Middle East
Long Description: Corner points of the project work of the regional project for Middle East and North Africa of the Foundation for Freedom are the human and civil rights in a functioning constitutional state, the acceptance of pluralistic structures and the protection of the right to property and the promotion of private sector activities in the framework of a market economy. The objective is to move towards open civil societies which - as formulated by the Development Policy Report of the Federal Government of Germany - give people the possibility to live 'a life of freedom, peace and selfreliance.

Short Description: GLOBAL CROP DIVERSITY TRUST FUND
Project title: Global Crop Diversity Trust Fund
Long Description: The aim of the plan is to make a contribution to the lasting company of national and international seeds banks and to efficient management. A target group are the users of the seeds banks, how national research facilities. The plan looks worldwide and contributes to the preservation of the agrobiodiversity as a global property as well as to the protection of the world food and the lasting agriculture. Target group in the narrower sense is the world population, in particular poorer, rural social classes in developing countries.
